description:
Model
AiARTiST-HyperRAY XL
==
Note ：The Vision model can only explain the interior furniture configuration of the space and the basic style of the room, but cannot correctly analyze the depth of the space. The image model may not fully understand all prompt words. Please refer to the example results.
A simple workflow to convert interior design floor plan drawing into photos using LLM.
The basic concept is to let the vision model describe the interior design floor plan, and segment each room into Chpaters. Refer to the floor plan to do a simulation of each room.
You can use Gemini or Ollama. Use Switch to switch the language model. The default is Gemini. You need to fill in your own API Key.
If it is an outdoor area plan drawing, the prompt words need to be modified to achieve better results.
==
注意，Vision模型仅能解释空间内部家具配置，房间基础样式，而无法正确解析空间深度，图像模型也可能无法完全理解全部提示词，请参考范例结果
使用LLM将室内设计平面图转换为模拟照片的简单工作流。
基本概念，让视觉模型叙述室内装修设计平面图，并以各个房间分段，参照平面图画出个别房间的模拟图，可使用Gemini或Ollama，使用Switch切换语言模型，默认为Gemini，需填入自己的API Key。
若是室外平面图，需修改提示词会有较好的效果。
name: DesignFloorPlanToPic (Ollama/Gemini)

widgets_values: (deformed iris, deformed pupils, semi-realistic, cgi, 3d, render, sketch), text, close up, cropped, out of frame, worst quality, low quality, jpeg artifacts, ugly, duplicate, morbid, mutilated, extra fingers, mutated hands, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn face, mutation, deformed, blurry, dehydrated, bad anatomy, bad proportions, extra limbs, cloned face, disfigured, gross proportions, malformed limbs, missing arms, missing legs, extra arms, extra legs, fused fingers, too many fingers, long neck, cropped, zoomed in, deformed arms, long hair, bra, bad hands, extra hands, bad fingers, paintings, sketches, (worst quality:2), (low quality:2), (normal quality:2), lowres, normal quality, ((monochrome)), ((grayscale)), skin spots, acnes, skin blemishes, age spot, glans, multiple characters, (big breasts:1.1),

2: Master Bedroom

The master bedroom is located on the main floor and has a private bathroom and walk-in closet. The bedroom is furnished with a king-sized bed, a dresser, and a nightstand. The bathroom has a double vanity, a shower, and a bathtub. The walk-in closet is located off of the bathroom and has plenty of storage space.

 3: Master Bathroom

The master bathroom is located on the main floor and has a double vanity, a shower, and a bathtub. The bathroom is finished with ceramic tile floors and granite countertops. The shower has a glass door and the bathtub has a tile surround.

 4: Walk-In Closet

The walk-in closet is located off of the master bathroom and has plenty of storage space. The closet is finished with built-in shelves and drawers.

 5: Kitchen

The kitchen is located on the main floor and has a breakfast area. The kitchen is furnished with a range, an oven, a dishwasher, and a refrigerator. The countertops are made of granite and the cabinets are made of wood. The breakfast area has a table and four chairs.

 6: Living Room

The living room is located on the main floor and has a fireplace. The living room is furnished with a sofa, a loveseat, and a coffee table. The fireplace is located on the wall behind the sofa.

 7: Dining Room

The dining room is located on the main floor and has a bay window. The dining room is furnished with a table and six chairs. The bay window has a view of the backyard.

 8: Laundry Room

The laundry room is located on the main floor. The laundry room is furnished with a washer, a dryer, and a sink.

 9: Garage

The garage is located on the main floor and has a storage area. The garage is finished with epoxy floors and has plenty of storage space.

 10: Covered Porch

The covered porch is located on the front of the house. The covered porch is furnished with a porch swing and two chairs. The covered porch is a great place to relax and enjoy the outdoors.

This is an interior design drawing. Please describe its design in detail and describe it in five chapters.
There must be the introductory word Chapter before the beginning of each paragraph.

This is an interior design drawing. Please describe its design in detail by each room and describe it in ten chapters in English.
There must be the introductory word Chapter before the beginning of each paragraph.

Chapter 1: Introduction

This is a traditional style house plan. The house has a total of 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The master bedroom is located on the main floor and has a private bathroom and walk-in closet. The other two bedrooms are located on the second floor and share a bathroom. The kitchen is located on the main floor and has a breakfast area. The living room is located on the main floor and has a fireplace. The dining room is located on the main floor and has a bay window. The laundry room is located on the main floor. The garage is located on the main floor and has a storage area.

Chapter 2: Master Bedroom

The master bedroom is located on the main floor and has a private bathroom and walk-in closet. The bedroom is furnished with a king-sized bed, a dresser, and a nightstand.
